note.p: Scottish cooper. Brother of William Kemp. Lived in Hawick.
Census returns of Scotland 1841 (The National Archives of Scotland: Hawick 789/2/25), 1861 (Hawick 2/11)
Scotland old parish registers births 799/30 129 Melrose (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 14 June 2022)
Scotland statutory deaths 789/83 Hawick (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 14 June 2022)
